Credit Line: The Cesnola Collection, Purchased by subscription, 1874–76
Description: Small perfume bottleTranslucent cobalt blue. Lop-sided, splayed rim with rounded lower edge and beveled top; cylindrical neck, with some tooling ridges; squat, piriform body; small, slightly flattened bottom.Intact, except for minor chip in rim; pinprick bubbles and blowing striations; dulling, heavy pitting and weathering with patches of brilliant iridescence.
Provenance: From Cyprus, said to be from a tomb at Idalion (modern Dali)
